description: Decimal expansion of tangent of 36 degrees.
comments: Also the decimal expansion of cotangent of 54 degrees. - _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Jun 30 2013
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: This number is sqrt(5-2*sqrt(5)). This number * A019970 = sqrt(5) = A002163. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 18 2006The smallest positive solution of cos(4*arctan(x)) = cos(6*arctan(x)). - _Thomas Olson_, Oct 03 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
